io.netty.channel

Class ChannelOutboundMessageHandlerAdapter<I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelOperationHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundMessageHandlerAdapter<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - The type of the messages to handle
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelOperationHandler, ChannelOutboundMessageHandler<I>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ByteArrayEncoder, MessageToByteEncoder, MessageToMessageEncoder, StringEncoder

    public abstract class ChannelOutboundMessageHandlerAdapter<I>
extends ChannelOperationHandlerAdapter
implements ChannelOutboundMessageHandler<I>
    Abstract base class which handles messages of a specific type.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler
